sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect, useCallback } from "react" import * as XLSX from "xlsx" const SupplierDetail = () => { const [supplierDetails, setSupplierDetails] = useState([]) const [supplierBillFile, setSupplierBillFile] = useState(null) const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ poNumber: "", poBalanceQty: "", poRate: "", inwardNo: "", vehicleNo: "", dateTime: "", supplierName: "", material: "", uom: "", receivedQty: "", receivedBy: "", supplierBillQty: "", supplierBillRate: "", receivedAmount: "", amount: "", difference: "", status: "Pending", }) const [errors, setErrors] = useState({}) // Mock data for testing const mockSupplierDetails = [ { id: 1, sno: 1, poNumber: "PO202401001", poBalanceQty: "100.00", inwardNo: "INW202401001", vehicleNo: "MH01AB1001", dateTime: "2024-01-15T10:00", supplierName: "Global Cement Ltd.", material: "OPC Cement", uom: "Tons", receivedQty: "98.00", receivedBy: "John D", supplierBillQty: "98.00", poRate: "4800.00", supplierBillRate: "4700.00", receivedAmount: "460600.00", amount: "", // calculated dynamically difference: (4800 - 4700).toFixed(2), status: "Pending", createdAt: "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000Z", }, { id: 2, sno: 2, poNumber: "PO202401002", poBalanceQty: "80.00", inwardNo: "INW202401002", vehicleNo: "MH01AB1002", dateTime: "2024-01-16T11:00", supplierName: "ABC Aggregates", material: "Crushed Stone", uom: "Cubic Meter", receivedQty: "78.00", receivedBy: "Priya S", supplierBillQty: "78.00", poRate: "1200.00", supplierBillRate: "1150.00", receivedAmount: "89700.00", amount: "", difference: (1200 - 1150).toFixed(2), status: "Pending", createdAt: "2024-01-16T11:00:00.000Z", }, { id: 3, sno: 3, poNumber: "PO202401003", poBalanceQty: "30.00", inwardNo: "INW202401003", vehicleNo: "MH01AB1003", dateTime: "2024-01-17T12:00", supplierName: "SteelBuild Co.", material: "TMT Bars", uom: "Tons", receivedQty: "29.50", receivedBy: "Anil M", supplierBillQty: "29.50", poRate: "60000.00", supplierBillRate: "59000.00", receivedAmount: "1740500.00", amount: "", difference: (60000 - 59000).toFixed(2), status: "Pending", createdAt: "2024-01-17T12:00:00.000Z", }, { id: 4, sno: 4, poNumber: "PO202401004", poBalanceQty: "40.00", inwardNo: "INW202401004", vehicleNo: "MH01AB1004", dateTime: "2024-01-18T14:30", supplierName: "ConcreteMixers Inc.", material: "Ready Mix Concrete", uom: "Cubic Meter", receivedQty: "39.00", receivedBy: "Sara K", supplierBillQty: "39.00", poRate: "4000.00", supplierBillRate: "3900.00", receivedAmount: "152100.00", amount: "", difference: (4000 - 3900).toFixed(2), status: "Pending", createdAt: "2024-01-18T14:30:00.000Z", }, { id: 5, sno: 5, poNumber: "PO202401005", poBalanceQty: "25.00", inwardNo: "INW202401005", vehicleNo: "MH01AB1005", dateTime: "2024-01-19T09:15", supplierName: "Ultra Tiles", material: "Ceramic Tiles", uom: "Boxes", receivedQty: "24.00", receivedBy: "Ramesh P", supplierBillQty: "24.00", poRate: "350.00", supplierBillRate: "345.00", receivedAmount: "8280.00", amount: "", difference: (350 - 345).toFixed(2), status: "Pending", createdAt: "2024-01-19T09:15:00.000Z", }, ] useEffect(() => { const savedDetails = localStorage.getItem("supplierDetails") if (savedDetails) { setSupplierDetails(JSON.parse(savedDetails)) } else { // Initialize with mock data if no saved data setSupplierDetails(mockSupplierDetails) localStorage.setItem("supplierDetails", JSON.stringify(mockSupplierDetails)) } // Set current date and time const now = new Date() setFormData((prev) => ({ ...prev, dateTime: now.toISOString().slice(0, 16), })) }, []) const saveSupplierDetails = (details) => { localStorage.setItem("supplierDetails", JSON.stringify(details)) setSupplierDetails(details) } const handleSupplierBillUpload = (e) => { const file = e.target.files[0] if (file && (file.type === "application/pdf" || file.type.startsWith("image/"))) { setSupplierBillFile(file) } else { alert("Please upload a PDF or image file only") } } const handleFileUpload = (id) => { const input = document.createElement("input") input.type = "file" input.accept = ".pdf,.jpg,.jpeg,.png,.gif" input.onchange = (e) => { const file = e.target.files[0] if (file && (file.type === "application/pdf" || file.type.startsWith("image/"))) { const updatedDetails = supplierDetails.map((detail) => detail.id === id ? { ...detail, supplierBillFile: file.name, updatedAt: new Date().toISOString() } : detail, ) saveSupplierDetails(updatedDetails) alert(`File "${file.name}" uploaded successfully!`) } else { alert("Please upload a PDF or image file only") } } input.click() } const calculateAmount = useCallback(() => { const qty = Number.parseFloat(formData.supplierBillQty) || 0 const rate = Number.parseFloat(formData.supplierBillRate) || 0 return (qty * rate).toFixed(2) }, [formData.supplierBillQty, formData.supplierBillRate]) const calculateDifference = useCallback(() => { const receivedAmount = Number.parseFloat(formData.receivedAmount) || 0 const amount = Number.parseFloat(formData.amount) || 0 return (amount - receivedAmount).toFixed(2) }, [formData.receivedAmount, formData.amount]) useEffect(() => { const amount = calculateAmount() const difference = calculateDifference() setFormData((prev) => ({ ...prev, amount: amount, difference: difference, })) }, [calculateAmount, calculateDifference]) const validateForm = () => { const newErrors = {} if (!formData.poNumber.trim()) newErrors.poNumber = "PO Number is required" if (!formData.poBalanceQty.trim()) newErrors.poBalanceQty = "PO Balance Qty is required" if (!formData.poRate.trim()) newErrors.poRate = "PO Rate is required" if (!formData.inwardNo.trim()) newErrors.inwardNo = "Inward No is required" if (!formData.vehicleNo.trim()) newErrors.vehicleNo = "Vehicle No is required" if (!formData.dateTime) newErrors.dateTime = "Date & Time is required" if (!formData.supplierName.trim()) newErrors.supplierName = "Supplier Name is required" if (!formData.material.trim()) newErrors.material = "Material is required" if (!formData.uom.trim()) newErrors.uom = "UOM is required" if (!formData.receivedQty.trim()) newErrors.receivedQty = "Received Qty is required" if (!formData.receivedBy.trim()) newErrors.receivedBy = "Received By is required" if (!formData.supplierBillQty.trim()) newErrors.supplierBillQty = "Supplier Bill Qty is required" if (!formData.supplierBillRate.trim()) newErrors.supplierBillRate = "Supplier Bill Rate is required" if (!formData.receivedAmount.trim()) newErrors.receivedAmount = "Received Amount is required" return newErrors } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const formErrors = validateForm() if (Object.keys(formErrors).length > 0) { setErrors(formErrors) return } const newDetail = { ...formData, id: Date.now(), sno: supplierDetails.length + 1, supplierBillFile: supplierBillFile ? supplierBillFile.name : null, createdAt: new Date().toISOString(), } const updatedDetails = [...supplierDetails, newDetail] saveSupplierDetails(updatedDetails) resetForm() } const resetForm = () => { const now = new Date() setFormData({ poNumber: "", poBalanceQty: "", poRate: "", inwardNo: "", vehicleNo: "", dateTime: now.toISOString().slice(0, 16), supplierName: "", material: "", uom: "", receivedQty: "", receivedBy: "", supplierBillQty: "", supplierBillRate: "", receivedAmount: "", difference: "", status: "Pending", }) setErrors({}) setSupplierBillFile(null) } const handleApproval = (id, action) => { const updatedDetails = supplierDetails.map((detail) => detail.id === id ? { ...detail, status: action, updatedAt: new Date().toISOString() } : detail, ) saveSupplierDetails(updatedDetails) } const handleDelete = (id) => { if (window.confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this supplier detail?")) { const updatedDetails = supplierDetails.filter((detail) => detail.id !== id) saveSupplierDetails(updatedDetails) } } const handleView = (detail) => { alert(` Supplier Detail Information: PO Number: ${detail.poNumber} Supplier: ${detail.supplierName} Material: ${detail.material} Quantity: ${detail.supplierBillQty} ${detail.uom} Rate: ₹${detail.supplierBillRate} Amount: ₹${detail.amount} Received By: ${detail.receivedBy} Status: ${detail.status} `) } const loadSuppliersFromExcel = () => { const input = document.createElement("input") input.type = "file" input.accept = ".xlsx,.xls" input.onchange = (e) => { const file = e.target.files[0] if (!file) { alert("⚠️ No file selected.") return } const reader = new FileReader() reader.onload = (event) => { try { const data = new Uint8Array(event.target.result) const workbook = XLSX.read(data, { type: "array" }) const sheetName = workbook.SheetNames[0] const worksheet = workbook.Sheets[sheetName] const jsonData = XLSX.utils.sheet_to_json(worksheet) if (jsonData.length === 0) { alert("❌ The selected Excel file is empty.") return } const parsedData = [] jsonData.forEach((row, index) => { if (row.poNumber) { const record = { id: row.id || Date.now() + index, sno: row.sno || index + 1, poNumber: row.poNumber || "", poBalanceQty: row.poBalanceQty || "", poRate: row.poRate || "", inwardNo: row.inwardNo || "", vehicleNo: row.vehicleNo || "", dateTime: row.dateTime ? new Date(row.dateTime).toISOString().slice(0, 16) : new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 16), supplierName: row.supplierName || "", material: row.material || "", uom: row.uom || "", receivedQty: row.receivedQty || "", receivedBy: row.receivedBy || "", supplierBillFile: row.pdfFile || null, supplierBillQty: row.supplierBillQty || "", supplierBillRate: row.supplierBillRate || "", receivedAmount: row.receivedAmount || "", amount: row.amount || "", difference: row.difference || "", status: row.status || "Pending", createdAt: row.createdAt ? new Date(row.createdAt).toISOString() : new Date().toISOString(), updatedAt: row.updatedAt ? new Date(row.updatedAt).toISOString() : null, } parsedData.push(record) } }) if (parsedData.length > 0) { setSupplierDetails(parsedData) localStorage.setItem("supplierDetails", JSON.stringify(parsedData)) alert(`✅ Successfully loaded ${parsedData.length} supplier records!`) } else { alert("⚠️ No valid supplier records found in the selected file.") } } catch (error) { console.error("Excel parsing error:", error) alert("❌ Error reading the selected Excel file.") } } reader.readAsArrayBuffer(file) } input.click() } const exportToExcel = () => { const worksheet = XLSX.utils.json_to_sheet(supplierDetails) const workbook = XLSX.utils.book_new() XLSX.utils.book_append_sheet(workbook, worksheet, "Supplier Details") XLSX.writeFile(workbook, "supplier_details.xlsx") } return (
📄

No supplier details found

) } export default SupplierDetail
